settings.text: Easy, hands free remote control of any Bluetooth device

settings.content: Easy, hands free remote control of any Bluetooth device

settings.text: Free delivery. 30 day money back guarantee. 1 year warranty

settings.title: Description
settings.content:
ArcX for smartphones:¬†With your phone in a pocket or a backpack, control playlists, adjust volume, accept calls* and make an outgoing call¬†on the move, hands free, even when wearing gloves.¬†You can also take selfies, scroll through TikTok videos and much more.¬†¬†

ArcX for all your other devices:¬†easy, hands free control of sports cameras, wireless speakers, home exercise equipment, TVs, AR/VR headsets, smart glasses and laptops - ArcX makes a great presentation clicker.

SOS:¬†With the patented SOS function instead of fumbling for your phone in an emergency, a discreet five second push of a button will let you call for help in case of injury or in a personal security situation.¬†

Award winning design:¬†wear the tech in a ring or attach to handlebars, kayak paddles or gym equipment.

Water and shock proof:¬†ArcX is great for swimming and water sports. It's certified to IP67 standard that means the tech can be submerged down to 1m/3ft. Don't worry if you drop it, ArcX is also super strong.

settings.title: Product Specification
settings.content:
Included in the pack:

  • ArcX tech module
  • Pack of five stretch fit rings¬†
  • Handle bar mount ¬†
  • Watch strap mount
  • Crocodile charging clip¬†
  • USB charging cable¬†
  • Hard back zip travel case
  • Free Android / iOS App¬†

Ring sizes are XS, S, M, L and XL. With a stretch fit design your ArcX can be worn with or without gloves.

*Requires on screen confirmation on iPhone‚Äôs with the software update¬†16.5.1

settings.title: Choose
settings.content: Choose how to use your ArcX. Either insert the tech into a ring or use it in a strap mount and attach to handlebars, kayak paddles, ski poles or anything else.

settings.title: Wake
settings.content: Move the joystick in any direction. It will appear as a discoverable accessory in your device‚Äôs Bluetooth settings.

settings.title: Connect
settings.content: Pair with your smartphone or any other device such as sports cameras and wireless speakers and enjoy easy, handsfree control on the move, even when wearing gloves.
ArcX revolutionises the way we control other devices. Setting up is as easy as 1,2,3.
ArcX is a micro joystick inside a water and shock proof housing. Connect via Bluetooth to any smartphone. Wear it on your index finger and use your thumb to operate.

settings.title: Playlist mode
settings.content: ArcX works with all major music apps including, but not limited to Spotify, Apple Music, Google Play Music, ¬†SoundCloud, Deezer, Amazon Music, Tidal and YouTube Music.

settings.title: Call / SOS mode
settings.content: The SOS call function can be triggered from any mode by pressing and holding the centre button for Ô¨Åve seconds.¬†This¬† calls the emergency services number in your region and also sends an SMS requesting help along with a Google map link of your current location.

settings.title: Camera mode
settings.content: Use ArcX to control sports cameras, smart phones and tablets to capture selÔ¨Åes, group photos and action shots.

settings.title: Other device mode
settings.content: Use ArcX as a remote control for laptops, desktops, TVs, e-skateboards,¬†AR/VR headsets,¬†and any other Bluetooth enabled device.
Customize your ArcX samrt ring any way you want.

settings.title: Works in All Conditions
settings.content:
ArcX is certified to IP67 international standards meaning it can be submerged down to 1m / 3ft and even be used for swimming and water sports.

  • Perfect in the sun and heat
  • 100% waterproof & robust
  • Winter ready: snow & ice proof
  • Ideal in muddy conditions
Multiple features in one super light yet compact wearable device.

settings.title: For active lifestyles
settings.body-text: ArcX simplifies your active life. Whether you‚Äôre running, cycling or at the gym control your music seamlessly without missing a beat. No need to reach for your phone, with ArcX you'll enjoy hands free control.¬†

settings.title: Durability at its finest
settings.body-text: Built to last, ArcX is water and shock proof ensuring durability in all your adventures. It‚Äôs so light you‚Äôll forget you‚Äôre wearing it.

settings.title: Ready for anything
settings.body-text: Stay safe with ArcX‚Äôs built in SOS button. A discreet yet powerful option to ensure help is just a press away in any situation.

settings.title: Customisable and stylish
settings.body-text: Match ArcX with your style. Available in a range of colours it‚Äôs not just a cool tech gadget but a fashion statement. Wear it on your finger or attach it to your gear - the choice is yours.¬†

settings.title: Universal compatibility
settings.body-text: Beyond music ArcX is your universal remote for any Bluetooth device. Control cameras, navigate presentations or mange smart home devices.

settings.content: Designed with a minimalist aesthetic, the running belt seamlessly blends with your athletic attire, adding a touch of style to your fitness ensemble. The thoughtful integration of reflective elements enhances safety during low-light conditions, ensuring you remain visible to others while pounding the pavement.

settings.line-text: attach to any sports equipment handle

settings.prose-text:
Your ArcX will work perfectly on its own, right out of the box but when linked to our powerful and intuitive App, you will have host of extra features and customisable options.

More information can be found on our Product Set Up page.

Easy, hands free remote control of any Bluetooth device

settings.title: How long does ArcX take to charge?
settings.content: ArcX takes about 60 minutes to fully charge.

settings.title: How will ArcX perform in salt water?
settings.content: In the same way you take care of other devices such as sports cameras, we recommend rinsing with fresh water after use in salt water, so with care you will not have any problems.¬†

settings.title: How do I turn the ArcX ring off?
settings.content: There is no need to turn your ring off. The ArcX ring is programmed to go to sleep after 120 seconds of inactivity.¬† When in sleep mode the battery will last for >20 days on a single charge.¬†To wake just move the joystick once in any direction, your ArcX will then continue to function as normal.

settings.title: What is the ArcX operating range?
settings.content: Your ArcX will work to a range of at least 25m (82 ft). We‚Äôve tested ArcX extensively and in numerous scenarios. For example, during an outdoor group workout in a busy central London park, ArcX worked well controlling a wireless speaker 100m (328 ft) away.

settings.title: What kind of battery does ArcX use?
settings.content: ArcX uses a high-quality lithium polymer rechargeable battery. Like your phone battery, the ArcX battery is fully integrated into the tech module. The battery will last up to five days of normal use on a single charge and at least twenty days on standby;¬†

settings.title: Will customers be able to update their software in future?
settings.content:
The short answer is yes! We will release not only bug fixes but also significant new features via regular Over The Air (OTA) software updates and your ArcX will continue to get better over time.

New software features, such as integration with other sports and fitness Apps, will not require any additional hardware purchases.

settings.title: Is ArcX suitable for kids?
settings.content: Children can absolutely use ArcX! With its single handed operation and intuitive UX our smart ring is simple to operate so it's suitable even for younger children (depending on their finger size).¬†

settings.title: I do not see my country listed as a shipping option.
settings.content: If you do not see your country as a shipping option, it means that we currently do not offer shipping to that country. We are working hard to add more countries to the list. However, please send us an email if you are from a country that is not shown, we'd love to hear from you.

settings.title: QuestionI am a retailer, how can I stock ArcX?
settings.content: For retailers interested in stocking ArcX smart rings and for a full list of prices and information please contact us at hello@arcx.fit.

settings.title: I have another question that isn't listed here!
settings.content: If you have any questions, feedback, or simply want to say hello, drop us a line at¬† hello@arcx.fit.

settings.title: Have a question ? We are here to help.
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 8am-8:30pm.
